statements: SELECT * FROM DataProtectionAuthorities;
SELECT id, name, compliance_level FROM DataProtectionAuthorities;
SELECT name, location FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM DataProtectionAuthorities ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE compliance_level = 'Low';
SELECT id, name, location FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE compliance_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE compliance_level = 'Low' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, contact_person FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE location LIKE '%USA%' AND compliance_level = 'Medium';
SELECT * FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE compliance_level = 'High' OR compliance_level = 'Low' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, location, compliance_level FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE 'B%' OR name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT authority_name, region FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT email, phone_number FROM Users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, user_name, email, phone_number FROM Users LEFT JOIN DataProtectionAuthorities ON Users.user_id = DataProtectionAuthorities.authority_id;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE region = 'EU' ORDER BY authority_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, phone_number FROM Users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT authority_name, email FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM Users u JOIN DataProtectionAuthorities d ON u.user_id = d.authority_id;
SELECT * FROM data_protection_authorities;
SELECT name, location FROM data_protection_authorities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data_type, data_value FROM personal_data WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM data_access_logs WHERE accessed_table = 'personal_data' ORDER BY date_accessed DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, accessed_table, DATE_FORMAT(date_accessed, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS formatted_date FROM data_access_logs;
SELECT * FROM data_protection_authorities WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT id, name FROM data_protection_authorities WHERE id > 5 AND location = 'Europe';
SELECT user_id, data_type, data_value FROM personal_data WHERE data_type = 'credit_card' ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_access_logs WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY date_accessed ASC;
SELECT id, accessed_table, date_accessed FROM data_access_logs WHERE date_accessed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, p.full_name, c.consent_type FROM users u JOIN personal_data p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN consent c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT u.username, a.action, a.timestamp FROM users u LEFT JOIN audit_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, p.date_of_birth, c.consent_type FROM users u JOIN personal_data p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN consent c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT u.username, a.action, a.timestamp FROM users u JOIN audit_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT u.username, p.full_name, c.consent_type FROM users u JOIN personal_data p ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN consent c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.consent_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM DataProtectionAuthorities;
SELECT name, location FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, data_type FROM PersonalData ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT law_name FROM PrivacyLaws WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT audit_date, audit_action FROM AuditLogs ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM DataProtectionAuthorities;
SELECT name, location FROM DataProtectionAuthorities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PrivacyLaws ORDER BY jurisdiction DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, data_type FROM PersonalData WHERE data_type LIKE '%social%';
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE authority_id = 3 AND user_id = 5;
